title: Avacynian Priest Uses its tap ability and taps to attack at the same time.

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

If Avacynian Priest attacks then it becomes tapped and it shouldn't be able to use its ability after. I played quite a few test games but could not reproduce the bug you describe. Maybe you can remember some details about the game this happened in? Anything that might give us a chance to thoroughly test this will be helpful, because if this is indeed a bug it seems something is fundamentally wrong within the code.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body: I'll try to reproduce it and keep better track of whats going on.  I wasn't really paying attention to the details I just thought that was unusual and didn't know I could report it until later on.
comments.author: [Comix...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100880791201746159829/)

comments.body: I tried to recreate it but couldn't. There must have been two of them on the board, one was attacking and the other one was tapping my defender. That's the only possibility I can think of. Next time I run into something unusual I will gather more detail before I post. Thanks

I'll close this as can not reproduce then.

We should have some sort of game log soon, that hopefully makes it easier to get the details clear. Do not hesitate to post possible issues though as I rather have a few bug reports that turn out to be false than no reports at all.

Thanks for the effort.
